title: Gift of the Seekers
description: Atho: a world struggling under the iron fist of a corrupt government. Siroti tes take children for both warranted and unwarranted reasons, wars rage on with no end in sight. Magicians and humans on both sides fight for survival. One hopes to overthrow while the other desires com- plete domination. In this second book o f the series, Loslin and West follow the cryptic riddles in the magic scroll left by their father for them. They must discover what 'From the other end of the sunrise, the elements will be controlled.' means. The map sends them to Acerima to find a mysterious man named Bobbyn."
author: Christy  Newman
